archimate:DataObject.name: ServiceManagementPolicy
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The ServiceManagementPolicy class defines the particular policies that are used to define how different aspects of the Service are managed and maintained. For example; assume that a Service is made up of several sub-Services. One of these sub-Services might require multiple PartyRoles to approve changes to its configuration; whereas another sub-Service might not require any approvals to change its configuration.
